item.description:
Agenda:

Introduce new members/ business card exchange

Target Market talk

1:1 meeting review/success stories

Feedback and ideas

We will also be selecting one person to give their 15 minute presentation for the next meetup!



If 10 or more people attend we will have pizza : )
item.how_to_find_us: Meet us in the lobby, Pearl Street entrance

group.name: The Boston Green Business Networking Group

item.name: Network!
